name: lass
standardDialog: Fairy types are so cute, don't you think?
Doesn't it suck how the patriarchy demonizes and belittles anything that can be attributed to the feminine?
startBattle: Oh, I suppose I have some time to battle you.
loseBattle: Oh, I guess I have some time to lose to you, too.
noPokemon: I'd love to fight you, but don't you think you should get a pokemon first?
playerTeamFainted: Oh no, your poor pokemon! You need to go get them healed at a Pokemon Center!
